MAN.TITLE: binomial

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a row vector with N+1 components

DESCRIPTION.P: pr=binomial(p,n) return the binomial probability vector. i.e the probability of k success in n independent trials, (where p is the probability of one success).
DESCRIPTION.VERBATIM: pr(k) = C(n,k) p^k (1-p)^(n-k) with C(n,k)= n!/(k!(n-k)!) = prod(1:n)/(prod(1:k)*prod(1:n-k)).
